title: Album Page, "Sketch of Dormers and Château", June 15–16, 1888
medium: Graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, top right corner: 51; bottom right corner: 44; to the right of drawing on bottom half of sheet: Fragment of / Chateau de L...gain / June 16th 1888; above, from left: front / side / small roof dormer / Tours / June 15th 1888 / Dormer.
description: Vertical sheet that has been cut down.  Illustrated above are four sketches of two dormers; the same one is drawing from the front, side and three-quarter view at left.  Below is a drawing of a large masonry building with a round tower with tall, conical roof and finial in the front, while visible behind it is another shorter tower with two chimney stacks, and the cupola of another tower.  Below to the right of the shorter square tower is a lower crenellated wall ending in a small stair turret.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Sketch of Dormers and Château", June 15–16, 1888.Graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-217.
